title: MOBILE APPLICATIONS
excerpt: Now a days mobile app is recommended to businesses. We make custom mobile applications.

introText.heading: We create Mobile App with modern coding technology that fit your demand!

Contact to require a detailed analysis and assessment of your plan.

faq.title: Mobile app consultancy and design
faq.desc: We provide professional mobile consulting and business analysis to analyze your needs and elicit requirements, Our mobile UI/UX design specialists create a conversion-driven mobile user experience that makes for high conversion and user retention.

faq.title: Mobile App Development
faq.desc: We offer native mobile development for iOS, Android and cross-platform/hybrid development on Cordova/PhoneGap, Xamarin, and React Native. Our business analysts help you decide on the platforms to target and choose a suitable development framework.

faq.title: Mobile App QA and Support
faq.desc: Our 4 mobile testing experts perform all types of mobile testing and debugging to ensure the high quality of your mobile solution.

faq.title: Mobile App Evolution
faq.desc: Xubisoft is always willing to help your app grow by fine-tuning it, expanding its functionality according to your roadmap, and introducing cutting-edge mobile experiences to keep your users continuously engaged.

items.title: Website to mobile app convertion
items.desc: We convert any kind of website to mobile app to exaust your business

items.title: Business mobile app
items.desc: Management app, Tracking app, Helpdesk app, Ecommerce app, School/collage/university app, POS app, HRM/CRM app etc

items.title: Social mobile app
items.desc: Newspaper app, timeline app, Matrimonial/Dating app, Tourism app, Personal app etc

items.title: Dymanic app with backend
items.desc: We can create any kind of app with a web backend. App could be run with the same data of website and a backend.
